scoringPlays.text: B.J. Smith 35 Yd Run (Brooks Buce Kick)
E.J. Jenkins 16 Yd pass from Luke Doty (Parker White Kick)
David Spaulding 74 Yd Interception Return (Parker White Kick)
Jamontez Woods 1 Yd Run (Brooks Buce Kick)

videos.headline: Smith gets Troy on the board with 35-yard TD run
videos.description: Troy RB B.J. Smith breaks free for a 35-yard touchdown in the second quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Smith gets Troy on the board with 35-yard TD run) 2021/10/02 ESHEET

videos.headline: Doty finds Jenkins for South Carolina's first TD of the day
videos.description: South Carolina QB Luke Doty finds E.J. Jenkins, who makes the catch in traffic and finds his way in for the score.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Doty finds Jenkins for South Carolina's first TD of the day) 2021/10/02 ESHEET

videos.headline: Spaulding electrifies for South Carolina 75-yard pick-six
videos.description: South Carolina DB David Spaulding intercepts a pass and returns it 75 yards to the house.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Spaulding electrifies for South Carolina 75-yard pick-six) 2021/10/02 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jamontez Woods scoots in for easy Troy TD
videos.description: Jamontez Woods gets the toss and walks into the end zone untouched to score a 1-yard Troy touchdown.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Jamontez Woods scoots in for easy Troy TD) 2021/10/02 ESHEET

videos.headline: Premature celebration at 1-yard line costs Gamecocks a surefire TD
videos.description: The South Carolina defense forces a fumble that is recovered by Jahmar Brown, but the Gamecocks miss out on a touchdown as he tosses the ball at the 1-yard line out of the end zone for a touchback.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Premature celebration at 1-yard line costs Gamecocks a surefire TD) 2021/10/2 ESHEET

videos.headline: Troy Trojans vs. South Carolina Gamecocks: Full Highlights
videos.description: Troy Trojans vs. South Carolina Gamecocks: Full Highlights

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Troy Trojans vs. South Carolina Gamecocks: Full Highlights) 2021/10/02 ESHEET Sotfull

videos.headline: Gamecocks use defensive dominance to tame Troy
videos.description: Behind a 75-yard pick-six from DB David Spaulding and QB Luke Doty's 255 passing yards, South Carolina improves to 3-2 on the season with a 23-14 win over the Trojans.
